title: 1937년 In re Green Bus Lines, Inc. 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: In re Green Bus Lines, Inc.. 판결일: 1937-10-26. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: In the Matter of Green Bus Lines, Inc., Petition of Max Turner, Pursuant to Section 25 of the General Corporation Law, to Review the Election of Twenty-one (21) Directors of Said Corporation Claimed to Have Been Chosen at a Meeting of the Green Bus Lines, Inc., Held on June 19th, 1937. Max Turner, Appellant Richard R. Coughlin and Green Bus Lines, Inc.
**판결일**: 1937-10-26
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 252 A.D. 741

## 판결문 요약


Order granting motion for a change of venue to Kings county unanimously reversed, with twenty dollars costs and disbursements, and the motion denied, and the order denying petitioner’s motion in so far as it may be construed as dismissing the proceeding, reversed and the matter remitted to Special Term for a hearing upon the merits pursuant to law. No opinion. Present — Martin, P. J., O’Malley, Townley, Dore and Cohn, JJ.
...
